abstract: Yahoo joins the OpenSocial alliance, and Google transfers control over the group it created to a non-profit foundation.
snippet: Yahoo joins the OpenSocial alliance, and Google transfers control over the group it created to a non-profit foundation.
lead_paragraph: As anticipated, Yahoo is joining the Google-led OpenSocial alliance, which is developing a common set of standards for programmers to create applications that can run on social networks and other sites.

headline.main: Yahoo Joins Social Network Group, as Google Gives Up Control
